title: Cheese soda bread
ingredients: ['180g (300ml) semi-rough flour (see tip)', '60g (100ml) barley flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '60g cold butter', '2 teaspoons mild mustard', '150g grated (strongly flavoured) cheese', '2 teaspoons cider vinegar', '200ml milk']
